Hi,

I recently upgraded to the .Net 4.0 version of the WPF datagrid from the  "Jun 25 2009" version.

I am now seeing a red border in cells during and after editing.  It seems inconsistent, but I assume it is some kind of validation.  Can this styling be disabled?

Thanks much,
Jon

FWIW - I fixed this by fixing a ValueConvertor that I have that was throwing an exception in certain scenarios.

I never saw the red border until upgrading to the .Net 4.0 version of the datagrid.

Cheers,
Jon
